hobbies.glass: I started getting into stained glass when COVID started; I didn't want to sit around just binge-watching Netflix. I was really challenging to get started, both because of the materials and equipment and because getting glass to break where/how you want it to requires a bit of practice.  To date I've bade a star, a honeycomb, a cactus and other things.
